lead_paragraph: "Ma Po tofu is supposed to bring sweat to your face, and numbness to your mouth," said Susur Lee, the executive chef of Shang in Manhattan and Lee in Toronto. His famous dish of silken tofu is made fiery with hot bean paste, Thai bird's-eye chilis and ground Szechwan pepper, and rounded out with soy sauce, vegetarian oyster sauce and garlic. It is best eaten over soothing, bland rice.
snippet: Taming a famous dish of silken tofu that is made fiery with hot bean paste.

headline.main: The Temporary Vegetarian: Vegan Ma Po Tofu

abstract: Taming a famous dish of silken tofu that is made fiery with hot bean paste.
